meanings.definition: Of or relating to social interaction between members of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: The homosocial gathering was a fun event for all the guys.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the homosocial atmosphere at the women's empowerment workshop.
meanings.sent3: The homosocial book club only read novels by male authors.
meanings.sent4: Their homosocial bond was as strong as brothers.
meanings.sent5: The homosocial nature of the team made them work seamlessly together.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or involving social relationships between individuals of the same gender.
meanings.sent1: The homosocial dynamics in the all-boys school were interesting to observe.
meanings.sent2: The homosocial nature of the fraternity created a strong sense of brotherhood.
meanings.sent3: Their homosocial lunch group always sat together at the cafeteria.
meanings.sent4: The homosocial bond between the teammates was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The homosocial connections in the community provided a sense of belonging.
